name: Dogfight: The Great War
description:
Shoot down enemy aircraft over the eastern front of The Great War.

This is a short game featuring 12 different playable aircraft in a First World War setting. 

Play as a German or a Russian pilot.

Fly 12 different aircraft.

Use your machine-gun, bombs, and rockets to shoot down enemy aircraft and balloons, and to destroy ground targets.

21 levels

Custom levels - Choose how many and which types of units are present on the battlefield.

Can you find the secret level?

-LT
